data.name: MetaDescription
data.value: Track maintenance, repairs, fuel consumption, and costs in one intuitive platform. Perfect for both car enthusiasts and everyday drivers seeking financial clarity.

data.name: HeroSubtitle
data.value: Your digital garage. Your vehicle's story. All in one beautifully designed platform.

data.name: ByCarLovers
data.value: By Car Lovers, For Car Lovers.

data.name: AboutLead
data.value: VehicleDiary is your ultimate digital garage — a smart and beautifully designed platform for tracking everything about your vehicle in one place.

data.name: AboutBody1
data.value: From repairs, upgrades, and oil changes to tires, vignettes, and future plans — it helps you stay organized, save money, and truly understand your vehicle's story. Gone are the days of messy spreadsheets, paper notes, or forgotten reminders.

data.name: AboutBody2
data.value: VehicleDiary automatically calculates how much you've already invested in your car, lets you upload invoices, PDFs, or images, and even keeps a to-do list for future ideas and modifications.

data.name: HighlightBox
data.value: Built by a passionate IT student and car enthusiast who believes every vehicle deserves attention — and every owner deserves a smarter, simpler way to manage it.

data.name: MissionText1
data.value: VehicleDiary isn't just a tool; it's a mission to connect car lovers through technology, data, and passion. We believe every vehicle has a story worth telling, and every owner deserves the tools to tell it.

data.name: MissionText2
data.value: Whether you're tracking a daily driver, restoring a classic, or maintaining a fleet, VehicleDiary gives you the insights you need to make smarter decisions and build a deeper connection with your vehicle.

data.name: PassionDrivenDescription
data.value: Built by enthusiasts who understand the bond between owner and machine. Perfect for project car builders tracking every modification.

data.name: InnovationFirstDescription
data.value: Cutting-edge technology meets intuitive design for seamless experiences. Auto-calculates total investment for financial clarity.

data.name: PrivacyFocusedDescription
data.value: Your data is yours. Bank-level security and complete transparency. Perfect for tracking sensitive financial vehicle data.

data.name: CTASubtitle
data.value: Join thousands of vehicle owners who are taking control of their vehicle management and finances. Perfect for both enthusiasts seeking to document their passion and practical drivers wanting financial wisdom.
